title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 9.7-inch Review
description:
High-end Android tablets are becoming few and far between, indicating to us that the tablet segment has been seeing a slowdown. Well, here's our review of the Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 9.7-inch – a brand new premium tablet product.

--------
PhoneArena.com is your ultimate source of mobile tech news, reviews, and info. The PhoneArena YouTube channel delivers a vast range of smartphone, tablet, and accessory video reviews, in addition to regular hands-on, unboxing, and other uploads.
